text: The Institut de l'information scientifique et technique, or INIST () is the CNRS centre of documentation located in France. Its mission is to collect, treat and break apart the results of scientific and technical research. The INIST produces three and maintains three different databases. It is based at Vandœuvre-lès-Nancy, in a building designed by Jean Nouvel. INST also publishes a number of electronic journals. == Directors == *Goéry Delacôte == References == == Other websites == * * I-Revues, E-Journal portal of INIST Category:French National Centre for Scientific Research Category:Scientific organizations based in France
title: Institut de l'information scientifique et technique
